title: Kami Ni Homura Wo - Saishuu Teiri No Shoumei Houhou
alternative_title: Kami ni Homura wo - Saishuu Teiri no Shoumei Houhou ; 神にホムラを ―最終定理の証明方法―
status: Kami ni Homura wo - Saishuu Teiri no Shoumei Houhou ; 神にホムラを ―最終定理の証明方法―
description:
Description :
        Fermat's Last Theorem. It is the greatest problem in mathematics, and has fascinated mathematicians all over the world for 350 years. 

In 1951, in postwar Japan, a young mathematician took on the challenge of the "Devil's Proof." His name was Andy Homura. His life and the history of the mathematics world were set in motion by the appearance of a great genius, a young girl named Lama. The proof that Homura bet her entire life on begins.
